description: Dashboard showing Prometheus Alertmanager metrics for observing status of the cluster and possible debugging.

links.title: Twitter
links.tooltip: Twitter account with prometheus related info

panels.description: Table containing list of Alertmanager instances showing it's version, up time, last reload time and if it was successful.
panels.title: Instance versions and up time

panels.description: Number of peers in the Alertmanager cluster.
panels.title: Cluster members

panels.description: Current number of active alerts.
panels.title: Number of active alerts

panels.description: Current number of suppressed alerts.
panels.title: Number of suppressed alerts

panels.description: Current number of active silences.
panels.title: Number of active silences

panels.description: Number of alerts by state such as `active`, `suppressed` etc.
panels.title: Active alerts in $instance

panels.description: Number of received alerts from Prometheus by status `firing` on positive axis and `resolved` on negative axis.
panels.title: Received alerts by status for $instance

panels.description: The total number of received alerts that were invalid.
panels.title: Invalid received alerts

panels.description: Number of sent notifications to distinct integrations such as PagerDuty, Slack and so on. On negative axis are displayed failed notifications.
panels.title: Notifications sent from $instance

panels.description: Duration of notification sends in 0.99 and 0.9 quantiles per integration.
panels.title: Notification durations per integration on $instance

panels.description:
Shows cluster score representing cluster health. From Hashicorps official documentation: 
> This metric describes a node's perception of its own health based on how well it is meeting the soft real-time requirements of the protocol. This metric ranges from 0 to 8, where 0 indicates "totally healthy".

For more info see https://www.consul.io/docs/agent/telemetry.html#cluster-health
panels.title: Clusterhealth score for $instance

panels.description: Shows gossip cluster members count in time and failing peers in case of any in red color.
panels.title: Cluster members count on $instance

panels.description: On positive axis shows number of peers that joined the cluster and on negative axis number of peers that left the cluster.
panels.title: Cluster peers left/joined on $instance

panels.description: On positive axis is number of attempts to reconnect the cluster. On negative axis if number of failed attempts.
panels.title: Cluster reconnections on $instance

panels.description: On positive axis is number of sent cluster messages by type `update`  or `full_state` and on negative axis the same for received messages.
panels.title: Cluster messages count on $instance

panels.description: On positive axis is size of sent cluster messages by type `update`  or `full_state` and on negative axis the same for received messages.
panels.title: Cluster messages size on $instance

panels.description: On positive axis is number of queued cluster messages and on negative axis number of pruned messages.
panels.title: Cluster messages queue on $instance

panels.description:
Gossip messages dropped: Number of oversized gossip messages that were dropped due to a full message queue.

Gossip messages failed: Number of oversized gossip message sends that failed.
panels.title: Count of oversized gossip messages on $instance

panels.description: Duration of oversized gossip message requests.
panels.title: Duration of oversized gossip messages on $instance

panels.description:
Silent gossip messages propagated: Number of received gossip messages that have been further gossiped.

Nflog gossip messages propagated: Number of received gossip messages that have been further gossiped.
panels.title: Number of  propagated gossip messages on $instance

panels.description:
Nf log query count: Number of notification log queries were received.

Nf log query errors: Number notification log received queries that failed.
panels.title: Nf log queries count for $instance

panels.description: Duration of notification log query evaluation.
panels.title: Nf log query duration for $instance

panels.description: Size of the last notification log snapshot in bytes.
panels.title: Nf log snapshot size for $instance

panels.description: Duration of the last notification log snapshot.
panels.title: Nf log snapshot duration for $instance

panels.description: Duration of the last notification log garbage collection cycle.
panels.title: Nf log Go GC time for $instance

panels.description: Number of silences by state.
panels.title: Silences count by state on $instance

panels.description:
Silences query count: Number of silence queries were received.

Silecnces query fails: Number of silence received queries did not succeed.
panels.title: Silences query count on $instance

panels.description: Duration of silence query evaluation.
panels.title: Silences query duration on $instance

panels.description: Size of the last silence snapshot in bytes.
panels.title: Silences snapshot size on $instance

panels.description: Duration of the last silence snapshot.
panels.title: Silences snapshot duration on $instance

panels.description: Duration of the last silence garbage collection cycle.
panels.title: Silences GC duraton on $instance

title: Alertmanager
